subject: CFP : 4th DICTAP2014- THAILAND
from: "The Fourth International Conference on Digital Information and Communication Technology and its Applications (DICTAP 2014)" <donotreply@sdiwc.us>
body:
Please Accept our Apology for Multiple Posting. THANK YOU. ============================================================== The Fourth International Conference on Digital Information and Communication Technology and its Applications (DICTAP 2014) University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce Bangkok, Thailand May 6-8, 2014 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/dictap2014/ ============================================================== The conference aims to enable researchers to build connections between different digital applications. The conference welcomes papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics: + Algorithms, Architecture, and Infrastructures + Computer Graphics + Communications Technology + Data Life Cycle in Products and Processes + Data Models for Production Systems and Services + Data Warehouses and Data Mining + Digital Rights Management + E-Learning, E-Business and E-Government + E-Commerce + Image Analysis and Image Processing + Interoperability + Natural Language Processing + Network Management Techniques + Networks Security, Encryption and Cryptography + Semantic Web, Ontologies and Rules + Soft Computing + Transmission, Antenna & Propagation + Web Mining including Web Intelligence and Web 3.0 + Web Services, Web based Application + Wireless and Optical Communications + XML and other extensible languages Researchers are encouraged to submit their work electronically. All papers will be fully refereed by a minimum of two specialized referees. Before final acceptance, all referees comments must be considered. ================ IMPORTANT DATES: Submission Deadline : April 06, 2014 Notification of Acceptance: April 15, 2014 Camera Ready Submission : April 26, 2014 Last Day for Registration : April 26, 2014 Conference Dates : May 06-08, 2014 ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5 Please Accept our Apology for Multiple Posting. THANK YOU.
==============================================================

The Fourth International Conference on Digital Information and Communication Technology and its Applications (DICTAP 2014)
University of the Thai Chamber of Commerce
Bangkok, Thailand
May 6-8, 2014
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/dictap2014/
==============================================================

The conference aims to enable researchers to build connections between different digital applications.

The conference welcomes papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics:

+ Algorithms, Architecture, and Infrastructures
+ Computer Graphics
+ Communications Technology
+ Data Life Cycle in Products and Processes
+ Data Models for Production Systems and Services
+ Data Warehouses and Data Mining
+ Digital Rights Management
+ E-Learning, E-Business and E-Government
+ E-Commerce
+ Image Analysis and Image Processing
+ Interoperability
+ Natural Language Processing
+ Network Management Techniques
+ Networks Security, Encryption and Cryptography
+ Semantic Web, Ontologies and Rules
+ Soft Computing
+ Transmission, Antenna & Propagation
+ Web Mining including Web Intelligence and Web 3.0
+ Web Services, Web based Application
+ Wireless and Optical Communications
+ XML and other extensible languages


Researchers are encouraged to submit their work electronically. All papers will be fully refereed by a minimum of two specialized referees. Before final acceptance, all referees comments must be considered.

================
IMPORTANT DATES:

Submission Deadline : April 06, 2014
Notification of Acceptance: April 15, 2014
Camera Ready Submission : April 26, 2014
Last Day for Registration : April 26, 2014
Conference Dates : May 06-08, 2014
